name: Flappy Mindfak
description:
Hi,

This is simple Flappy Bird clone with RPG twist made in GameMaker Studio just for fun and to learn this program. And if you are curious what Mindfak is and you like heavy music check their music on YouTube, Sptify, iTunes etc.

P.S: Soon I will start my blog that will describe my way to game dev. So you will find there what I learned so far, what I am learning right now, my creations etc. If you are interested check this site and I will edit this with link to my blog.
